person.persName: John H. Skaggs (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer and private 5th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.))

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Price Scaggs in Taylor County, Kentucky on August 7, 1849. Father of William Scaggs, Josephine Scaggs, Franklin Scaggs, Susan Scaggs, Alfred Scaggs, Nancy Scaggs, John Scaggs, Brittain Scaggs, and Kitty Scaggs. Laborer in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 5th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as private from March 24, 1862 to June 26, 1862. Served as justice of the peace in Marion County in 1864.
